parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "RNN-T Speech Recognition Training",
  "software": [
    "PyTorch",
    "NVIDIA DGX",
    "SLURM",
    "MLPerf"
  ],
  "resource_requirements": {
    "DGXSYSTEM": "Required",
    "CONT": "Container Image Name - Required",
    "DATADIR": "Data Directory - Required",
    "METADATA_DIR": "Metadata Directory - Required",
    "SENTENCEPIECES_DIR": "Sentence Pieces Directory - Required",
    "MLPERF_RULESET": "Optional - Defaults to 2.1.0",
    "NEXP": "Number of Experiments - Optional - Defaults to 1",
    "DATESTAMP": "Current Date and Time Stamp - Optional - Defaults to (date +'%y%m%d%H%M%S%N')",
    "CLEAR_CACHES": "Whether to clear caches - Optional - Defaults to 1",
    "LOGDIR": "Log Directory - Optional - Defaults to ./results",
    "API_LOG_DIR": "API Log Directory - Optional - Defaults to ./api_logs",
    "WALLTIME_DRYRUN": "Wall Time - Optional - Defaults to $WALLTIME",
    "TIME_TAGS": "Enable Time Tagging - Optional - Defaults to 0",
    "NVTX_FLAG": "Enable NVTX Profiling - Optional - Defaults to 0",
    "NCCL_TEST": "Enable NCCL Test - Optional - Defaults to 0",
    "SYNTH_DATA": "Enable Synthetic Data - Optional - Defaults to 0",
    "EPOCH_PROF": "Enable Epoch Profiling - Optional - Defaults to 0",
    "DISABLE_CG": "Disable CUDA Graphs - Optional - Defaults to 0",
    "NVMLPERF_NSIGHT_LOCATION": "NVIDIA Nsight Location - Optional",
    "API_LOGGING": "Enable API Logging - Optional - Defaults to 0",
    "REMOUNT_WORKDIR": "Remount Working Directory - Optional - Defaults to 0",
    "SLURM_JOB_NUM_NODES": "Number of Nodes - Required",
    "SLURM_JOB_NODELIST": "Node List - Required",
    "MELLANOX_VISIBLE_DEVICES": "Optional - Environment variable for Mellanox device visibility",
    "DGXNNODES": "Number of DGX Nodes - Required",
    "DGXNGPU": "Number of GPUs per DGX Node - Required",
    "BATCHSIZE": "Batch Size - Required"
  }
}
```
